title: What We Do
intro: We deliver mission-critical technology strategy, implementation, and transformation for high-stakes environments.

items.title: Strategic IT Consulting
items.body: End-to-end strategy and execution for complex technology portfolios with multi-year, multimillion-dollar impacts.

items.title: Modernization & Integration
items.body: Integrating legacy platforms with cloud-native architectures while preserving mission continuity.

items.title: Program Delivery
items.body: Disciplined program leadership to ensure on-time, on-budget delivery aligned to operational outcomes.
